name: excel-to-csv
title: Excel to CSV Converter
description: Convert Excel spreadsheets (XLSX/XLS) to CSV format
content:
Overview

This application converts Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx and .xls files) into CSV (Comma-Separated Values) format. Built using pandas and openpyxl, it preserves all data while converting to a universal text-based format.

Features

  • Convert XLSX and XLS files to CSV
  • Preserves all data from the first sheet
  • Universal CSV format for easy import
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your Excel file (.xlsx or .xls) from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the CSV output

Output

The application generates a CSV file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., data.xlsx becomes data.csv). The CSV contains all data from the first sheet of the Excel workbook.

Use Cases

  • Converting Excel data for database import
  • Creating universal text-based data files
  • Preparing data for analysis tools
  • Sharing data in a simple format
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/excel_to_csv.py" "${inputFile}" "${outputDir}"
